In England, in the seven days to 16 April, there were 162,990 new confirmed cases (288.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 April, there were 239,559 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 32% (76,569 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 April is 18,437,668 (32,604.1 cases per 100,000 population).
